column4: hmm question I want to extract phpmyadmin from a client install to /var/www but I somehow haven't got the rights (using login info created during the install) how can that login not be superuser and how can I make a superuser
you want hakker to have root rights?
well you either do that with "root" user, or you add yourself to an appropriate group
how did you add yourself to the group?
you're supposed to execute that as an xchat command :D
you don't necessaryly need -R in the second command
what you did now was changed permissions and group for /var/www
